verses.1: Topa in inn lam pih kei leh innlamte始 sepna a mawkna ahi hi. Topa in khuapi hut pih kei leh khuapi cingte始 cinna a mawkna ahi hi.
verses.2: Zingsangin tho baihin, gimpi a nangma sep sa an na nek hakna zong a mawkna mah ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in ama itte tungah a ihmut sung nangawnun a pia hi.
verses.3: En un, tate pen Topa始 tung pan a letsong hi a, tapate pen ama hong piak thupha ahi hi.
verses.4: Mi khat in a khangno lai-in a neih tate pen galhang pa始 khut sunga a om a thaltangte tawh kibang hi.
verses.5: A thallawng dimin tua bang thaltang a nei pa mi lungdam ahi hi. Amah guallel ngei lo dinga, zahhuai ngei lo ding hi.
